com.hazelcast.replicatedmap.impl.record

Class AbstractBaseReplicatedRecordStore<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.replicatedmap.impl.record.AbstractBaseReplicatedRecordStore<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - key type
    V - value type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReplicatedRecordStore
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractReplicatedRecordStore

    public abstract class AbstractBaseReplicatedRecordStore<K,V>
extends Object
implements ReplicatedRecordStore
    Internal base class to encapsulate the internals from the interface methods of ReplicatedRecordStore
